Title: Silverlight OOB Extension
Description: Silverlight OOB extension for offline data caching. Silverlight 3 brings the out-of-browser (OOB) feature. Perfect for the offline use of Silverlight applications. The only problem is data access. The Silverlight OOB extension helps with this problem and caches data.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
Silverlight OOB extension for offline data caching. Silverlight 3 brings the out-of-browser (OOB) feature. Perfect for the offline use of Silverlight applications. The only problem is data access. The Silverlight OOB extension helps with this problem and caches data.

Welcome
Silverlight OOB extension is currently under development. If you are interested in joining this project as a developer, please send me a message.
